# Peer Endorsement Badge

## Overview
To complete this lesson on performing simple daily acts of kindness, you'll need to receive endorsements from your peers confirming your kind actions.

## Instructions
1. Download and complete the "Acts of Kindness Challenge" PDF from the resources section
2. Document at least three kind acts you performed this week
3. Upload your completed challenge PDF to the submission area
4. Share your submission link with at least two classmates
5. Your peers will review your submission and click the endorsement button if they believe you've genuinely completed the challenge

## Completion Requirements
* You must receive a minimum of two peer endorsements
* Once you've received the required endorsements, the next lesson will automatically unlock
* This peer validation process ensures accountability and encourages community support

Remember: Kindness matters most when it comes from genuine care for others!
